forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn breaks gently over Downtown San Francisco, casting a soft golden hue across the skyline. The sun shines brightly, promising a day that, while crisp, invites one outdoors. Currently, the temperature hovers in the realm of the cool, gradually shifting from the brisk feel of morning into the more temperate air of noon, with a noticeable drop as afternoon approaches. A gentle breeze, brushing the city from the north, carries the scent of the Bay, mixing the invigorating chill with the warmth of the sun’s rays.

Today’s forecast hints at a generally pleasant experience, with clarity prevailing, though a subtle fog may cling to the edges of the bay, hinting at the ever-present marine layer that defines this coastal landscape. For those venturing out, layering is advisable—perhaps a light jacket accompanied by a cozy sweater, perfect for the shifting temperatures as one moves from the sunshine into the shade of towering buildings. The culinary scene beckons with the promise of warm coffee or fresh pastries enjoyed at a nearby café, while the streets await exploration; a leisurely stroll through the Mission District could reveal vibrant murals and inviting shops. As evening descends, the skies will remain partly cloudy, offering a tranquil end to the day before the temperatures drop, encouraging a comforting retreat into the warmth of home.
